medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 1 day history of severe RUQ abdominal pain that began approximately 30 minutes after eating chicken. The pain has persisted around 30 minutes to 1 hour post meals but improves in between meals, never completely disappearing. No particular foods exacerbate the pain more than others. The patient also endorses nausea and bloating.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, Asthma, Erectile Dysfunction, Hypogonadism, Cervical Radiculopathy, health maintenance history of depression, previous surgeries include bilateral inguinal hernia repairs with mesh, ankle surgery, right hand surgery, and circumcision.
medical_history.family_history: Mother living with hypertension; father has a history of Alzheimer's disease; two brothers with diabetes mellitus type 2. No myocardial infarctions or cerebrovascular accidents. No colon or prostate cancer.
